name: Jenny LeClue - The Journal of Professor Zazer
name_original: Jenny LeClue - The Journal of Professor Zazer
description:
The Journal of Professor Zazer is a mini adventure, set in the mysterious world of Jenny LeClue - Detectivú. Join brilliant young detective Jenny LeClue and discover the secrets within!


This is a completely free Playable Teaser - A taste of the atmosphere of Jenny LeClue.

Jenny LeClue, Volume One will feature a fully voiced cast of characters, platforming, and many secrets to explore and uncover in Arthurton.

If you enjoy the Playable Teaser, please consider pre-ordering the full game at jennyleclue.com ( or contributing via itchi.io )


Report a bug: bugs.jennyleclue.com

Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/jennyleclue

PreOrder: jennyleclue.com


IMPORTANT NOTE:

We want as many people to play the teaser as possible, so please don't feel obligated to pay anything.

Simply click on "Download Now"and then "No thanks, just take me to the downloads" to get the game completely free!
